languages.text: "Торбальд, дай ему знать, что я нахожу его слова дерзкими".
"Thorbald, let him know that I find his words too brazen for my liking."
languages.original_text: "Торбальд, дай ему знать, что я нахожу его слова дерзкими".

traits.locale_text: "Thorbald, let him know that I find his words too brazen for my liking."
"Thorbald, let him know that I find his words too brazen for my liking."

"Thorbald, let him know that I find his words too brazen for my liking."
"Thorbald, let him know that I find his words too brazen for my liking."

languages.text: “索巴德，告诉他，我觉得他太能胡说八道了。”
languages.original_text: "Thorbald, let him know that I find his words too brazen for my liking."

traits.locale_text: “索巴德，告诉他，我觉得他太能胡说八道了。”

languages.text: « Thorbald, dites-lui que ses paroles sont un peu trop effrontées à mon goût. »
languages.original_text: "Thorbald, let him know that I find his words too brazen for my liking."

traits.locale_text: « Thorbald, dites-lui que ses paroles sont un peu trop effrontées à mon goût. »

languages.text: 「トールバルド、奴の言葉はあまりに図々しすぎると私が感じていると伝えてくれ」
languages.original_text: "Thorbald, let him know that I find his words too brazen for my liking."

traits.locale_text: 「トールバルド、奴の言葉はあまりに図々しすぎると私が感じていると伝えてくれ」

languages.text: «Thorbald, infórmele de que sus palabras son demasiado osadas para mi gusto».
languages.original_text: "Thorbald, let him know that I find his words too brazen for my liking."

traits.locale_text: «Thorbald, infórmele de que sus palabras son demasiado osadas para mi gusto».

languages.text: "Thorbald, lasst ihn wissen, dass seine Worte etwas zu kühn für meinen Geschmack sind."
languages.original_text: "Thorbald, let him know that I find his words too brazen for my liking."

traits.locale_text: "Thorbald, lasst ihn wissen, dass seine Worte etwas zu kühn für meinen Geschmack sind."

languages.text: "Thorbald, sözcüklerini ne kadar pişkince bulduğumu göster ona."
languages.original_text: "Thorbald, let him know that I find his words too brazen for my liking."
